subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Patriots Coach Bill Belichick seems to have a favorite opposing player, the Ravens’ Ed Reed. On Sunday, Belichick and Reed will face each other in the A.F.C. championship game.
snippet: Patriots Coach Bill Belichick seems to have a favorite opposing player, the Ravens’ Ed Reed. On Sunday, Belichick and Reed will face each other in the A.F.C. championship game.
